html.p: Suggested reading from the textbook to accompany lecture 14: Chapter 9, sections 9.1-9.2 and Chapter 13, section 13.2
List of visualizations and links is in Chapter 9, sections 9.9.1-9.9.5
Solved examples and extra problems are in Chapter 9, sections 9.8-9.9, also examples 9.11.1-9.11.3 and 9.11.8
